trans-unit.source: Provides a base class for all Panel elements.
trans-unit.target: Fornece uma classe base para todos os elementos do painel.

trans-unit.source: Use Panel elements to position and arrange child objects in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] applications.
trans-unit.target: Use os elementos do painel para posicionar e organizar objetos filho em [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] aplicativos.

trans-unit.source: A Panel contains a collection of <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> objects, which are in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.Children%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Um painel contém uma coleção de <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>objetos, que estão no <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.Children%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.Children%2A> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement>

trans-unit.source: Adding a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> child to a Panel implicitly adds it to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.UIElementCollection> for the Panel element.
trans-unit.target: Adicionando um <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>filho a um painel adiciona implicitamente para o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.UIElementCollection>para o elemento de painel.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.UIElementCollection> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement>

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] provides a comprehensive suite of derived Panel implementations, enabling many complex layouts.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]Fornece um conjunto abrangente de implementações derivadas de painel, permitindo que vários layouts complexos.

trans-unit.source: If you want to implement new layout containers, use the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MeasureOverride%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ArrangeOverride%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Se você quiser implementar novos contêineres de layout, use o <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MeasureOverride%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ArrangeOverride%2A>métodos.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ArrangeOverride%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.MeasureOverride%2A>

trans-unit.source: For a demonstration of how to use these methods, see [Create a Custom Content-Wrapping Panel Sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=159979).
trans-unit.target: Para ver uma demonstração de como usar esses métodos, consulte [criar um exemplo de painel de conteúdo personalizado encapsulamento](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=159979).

trans-unit.source: Panel elements do not receive mouse or stylus events if a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.Background%2A> is not defined.
trans-unit.target: Os elementos do painel não receber eventos de mouse ou caneta se um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.Background%2A>não está definido.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.Background%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you need to handle mouse or stylus events but do not want a background for your Panel, use <xref:System.Windows.Media.Brushes.Transparent%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Se você precisar do identificador de mouse ou caneta eventos, mas não quiser que um plano de fundo para o painel, use <xref:System.Windows.Media.Brushes.Transparent%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Brushes.Transparent%2A>

trans-unit.source: Panel elements do not receive focus by default.
trans-unit.target: Os elementos do painel não receber o foco por padrão.

trans-unit.source: To compel a panel element to receive focus, set the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Focusable%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Para que levam a um elemento do painel para receber o foco, defina o <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Focusable%2A>propriedade `true`.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Focusable%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Panel"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Panel"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Brush"></xref> that is used to fill the area between the borders of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Panel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Brush"> </xref> que é usado para preencher a área entre as bordas de um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Panel"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel> elements do not receive mouse or stylus events if a Background is not defined.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel>elementos não recebe eventos de mouse ou caneta se um plano de fundo não está definido.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel>

trans-unit.source: If you need to handle mouse or stylus events but do not want a background for your <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel>, use <xref:System.Windows.Media.Brushes.Transparent%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Se você precisa do identificador de mouse ou caneta eventos, mas não quiser que um plano de fundo para o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel>use <xref:System.Windows.Media.Brushes.Transparent%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Brushes.Transparent%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel>

trans-unit.target: # # Informações de propriedade de dependência | | | |-|-| | Campo de identificador | | | Definir propriedades de metadados `true`|, |

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Brush"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Brush"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: This default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.Background*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.Background*>DependencyProperty.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.Background*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.UIElementCollection"></xref> of child elements of this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Panel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.UIElementCollection"> </xref> de elementos filho desse <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Panel"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The Children collection of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel> element can only consist of <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> objects.
trans-unit.target: A coleção de filhos de um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel>elemento pode consistir apenas de <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>objetos.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel>

trans-unit.source: Adding a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> child to a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel> implicitly adds it to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.UIElementCollection> for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel> element.
trans-unit.target: Adicionando um <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>filho para uma <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel>adiciona implicitamente para o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.UIElementCollection>para o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel>elemento.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.UIElementCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement>

trans-unit.source: Do not use this collection with derived <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel> classes; use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.InternalChildren%2A> collection instead.
trans-unit.target: Não usar essa coleção com derivado <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel>classes; use o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.InternalChildren%2A>coleção em vez disso.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.InternalChildren%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel>

trans-unit.source: This property returns `null` if the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel> is data bound.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade retorna `null` se o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel>associada a dados.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.UIElementCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.UIElementCollection"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.UIElementCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é vazio <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.UIElementCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.UIElementCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Cria um novo <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.UIElementCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Use the generated <xref:System.Windows.Controls.UIElementCollection> to cache information about child elements or to perform incremental layout updates.
trans-unit.target: Use o gerado <xref:System.Windows.Controls.UIElementCollection>em cache as informações sobre elementos filho ou para executar atualizações de layout incremental.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.UIElementCollection>

trans-unit.source: The logical parent element of the collection to be created.
trans-unit.target: O elemento pai lógico da coleção a ser criado.

trans-unit.source: An ordered collection of elements that have the specified logical parent.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção ordenada de elementos que têm o pai lógico especificado.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref> child of this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Panel"></xref> at the specified index position.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"> </xref> filho deste <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Panel"> </xref> na posição de índice especificado.

trans-unit.source: The index position of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref> child.
trans-unit.target: A posição de índice a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"> </xref> filho.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref> child of the parent <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Panel"></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"> </xref> filho do pai <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Panel"> </xref> elemento.

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.ZIndex*> property for a given element.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o valor de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.ZIndex*>propriedade para um determinado elemento.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.ZIndex*>

trans-unit.source: The element for which to retrieve the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.ZIndex*> value.
trans-unit.target: O elemento para o qual recuperar o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.ZIndex*>valor.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.ZIndex*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.ZIndex*> position of the element.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.ZIndex*>posição do elemento.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.ZIndex*>

trans-unit.source: The element is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O elemento é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Panel"></xref> arranges its descendants in a single dimension.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se este <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Panel"> </xref> organiza seus descendentes em uma única dimensão.

trans-unit.source: Among predefined panel elements, only <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel> returns `true`, because its orientation is in a single dimension.
trans-unit.target: Entre predefinidos elementos do painel, apenas <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>retorna `true`, porque sua orientação está em uma única dimensão.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>

trans-unit.source: Subclasses of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel> can override this property.
trans-unit.target: As subclasses de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel>pode substituir essa propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the orientation of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Panel"></xref> is in one dimension; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a orientação do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Panel"> </xref> está em uma dimensão; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Panel"></xref> arranges its descendants in a single dimension.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se este <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Panel"> </xref> organiza seus descendentes em uma única dimensão.

trans-unit.source: Among predefined panel elements, only <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel> returns `true`, because its orientation is in a single dimension.
trans-unit.target: Entre predefinidos elementos do painel, apenas <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>retorna `true`, porque sua orientação está em uma única dimensão.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the orientation of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Panel"></xref> is in one dimension; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a orientação do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Panel"> </xref> está em uma dimensão; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.UIElementCollection"></xref> of child elements.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.UIElementCollection"> </xref> de elementos filho.

trans-unit.source: The returned collection includes items that are added directly in code, and also items that are generated by data binding.
trans-unit.target: A coleção retornada inclui itens que são adicionados diretamente no código e também os itens que são gerados pela associação de dados.

trans-unit.source: Classes that are derived from <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel> should use this property, instead of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.Children%2A> property, for internal overrides such as <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MeasureCore%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ArrangeCore%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Classes derivadas de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel>deve usar essa propriedade, em vez da <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.Children%2A>propriedade para a substituição interna, como <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MeasureCore%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ArrangeCore%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ArrangeCore%2A> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MeasureCore%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.Children%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel>

trans-unit.source: An ordered collection of <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção ordenada de <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> objetos.

trans-unit.source: This property has no default value.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade não tem valor padrão.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates that this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Panel"></xref> is a container for [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] items that are generated by an <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica que isso <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Panel"> </xref> é um contêiner para [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] itens que são gerados por um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: You cannot bind data to this property.
trans-unit.target: Você não pode associar dados a esta propriedade.

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`||
trans-unit.target: # # Informações de propriedade de dependência | | | |-|-| | Campo de identificador | | | Definir propriedades de metadados `true`||

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Panel"></xref> is an items host; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.IsItemsHost*>DependencyProperty.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.IsItemsHost*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets an enumerator that can iterate the logical child elements of this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Panel"></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um enumerador que pode iterar os elementos filhos lógicos deste <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Panel"> </xref> elemento.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>.
trans-unit.target: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: This property has no default value.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade não tem valor padrão.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Orientation"></xref> of the panel, if the panel supports layout in only a single dimension.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Orientation"> </xref> do painel, se o painel oferece suporte a layout em apenas uma única dimensão.

trans-unit.source: Subclasses of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel> can override this property.
trans-unit.target: As subclasses de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel>pode substituir essa propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel>

trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.HasLogicalOrientation%2A>é `false`, o valor da propriedade deve ser ignorado.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.HasLogicalOrientation%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Orientation"></xref> of the panel.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Orientation"> </xref> do painel.

trans-unit.source: This property has no default value.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade não tem valor padrão.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Orientation"></xref> of the panel, if the panel supports layout in only a single dimension.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Orientation"> </xref> do painel, se o painel oferece suporte a layout em apenas uma única dimensão.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.HasLogicalOrientation%2A> is `false`, this property value should be ignored.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.HasLogicalOrientation%2A>é `false`, o valor da propriedade deve ser ignorado.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.HasLogicalOrientation%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Orientation"></xref> of the panel.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Orientation"> </xref> do painel.

trans-unit.source: This property has no default value.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade não tem valor padrão.

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.IsItemsHost*> property value has changed.
trans-unit.target: Indica que o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.IsItemsHost*>o valor da propriedade foi alterada.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.IsItemsHost*>

trans-unit.source: The old property value.
trans-unit.target: O valor da propriedade antiga.

trans-unit.source: The new property value.
trans-unit.target: O novo valor da propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Draws the content of a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext"></xref> object during the render pass of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Panel"></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: Desenha o conteúdo de um <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext"> </xref> objeto durante a fase de processamento de um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Panel"> </xref> elemento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext"></xref> object to draw.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext"> </xref> objeto ao desenhar.

trans-unit.source: Invoked when the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.VisualCollection"></xref> of a visual object is modified.
trans-unit.target: Chamado quando o <xref href="System.Windows.Media.VisualCollection"> </xref> de um objeto visual é modificado.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.ZIndex%2A> values are automatically recalculated when child elements are added to or removed from the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.ZIndex%2A>os valores são recalculados automaticamente quando elementos filho são adicionados ou removidos da coleção.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.ZIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref> that was added to the collection.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"> </xref> que foi adicionado à coleção.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref> that was removed from the collection.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"> </xref> que foi removido da coleção.

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.ZIndex*> attached property for a given element.
trans-unit.target: Define o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.ZIndex*>propriedade para um determinado elemento anexada.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.ZIndex*>

trans-unit.source: The greater the `value` of a given `element`, the more likely the `element` is to appear in the foreground.
trans-unit.target: Maior a `value` de um determinado `element`, maior será a probabilidade de `element` deve ser exibido em primeiro plano.

trans-unit.source: Likewise, if an `element` has a relatively low `value`, the `element` will likely appear in the background.
trans-unit.target: Da mesma forma, se um `element` tem relativamente baixo `value`, o `element` provavelmente será exibida no plano de fundo.

trans-unit.source: For example, an `element` that has a `value` of 5 will appear above an `element` that has a `value` of 4, which in turn will appear above an `element` that has a value of 3, and so on.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, um `element` que tem um `value` de 5 aparecerá acima um `element` que tem um `value` de 4, que por sua vez, será exibida acima um `element` que tem um valor de 3 e assim por diante.

trans-unit.source: Negative values are allowed, and they continue this precedence pattern.
trans-unit.target: Valores negativos são permitidos, e eles continuam esse padrão de precedência.

trans-unit.source: Members of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.Children%2A> collection that have equal <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.ZIndex%2A> values are rendered in the order in which they appear in the visual tree.
trans-unit.target: Membros de um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.Children%2A>coleção que têm igual <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.ZIndex%2A>valores são processados na ordem em que aparecem na árvore visual.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.ZIndex%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.Children%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can determine the index position of a child by iterating the members of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.Children%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: Você pode determinar a posição do índice de um filho iterando os membros de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.Children%2A>coleção.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.Children%2A>

trans-unit.source: The element on which to apply the property value.
trans-unit.target: O elemento no qual aplicar o valor da propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The order on the z-plane in which this element appears.
trans-unit.target: A ordem no plano z no qual esse elemento aparece.

trans-unit.source: The element is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O elemento é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.Children*> collection of a panel should be serialized.
trans-unit.target: Determina se o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.Children*>coleção de um painel deve ser serializada.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.Children*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.Children*> collection should be serialized; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>. The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.Children*> collection is only serialized if it is not empty and not <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <> </> *> coleção deve ser serializado; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>. O <> </> *> coleção é serializada somente se ele não está vazio e não <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.
